author: Staff Reporter
text:
‘Amma Arogya Thittam’ was launched in the district on Thursday.

The scheme was inaugurated by Collector M. Ravikumar at an upgraded primary health centre at Kazhugumalai in Kovilpatti taluk in the presence of C. Raju, MLA. Chief Minister Jayalalithaa launched this scheme on March 1. Those aged 30 years and above could check their health – blood sugar, cholesterol, blood pressure and haemoglobin count, skin test and x-ray – at any upgraded PHC. A.D. Bosco Raja, DDHS, Kovilpatti, said 13 upgraded PHCs were functioning. Kadambur Block Medical Officer G. Sivaprakash and Kazhugumalai Medical Officer M. Jeyapradeep were present.
title: ‘Amma Arogya Thittam’ launched
